short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily zoom in on Instagram photos directly from the web interface.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
InstaZoom allows you to easily zoom in/out on images and videos by simply hovering and zooming with these shortcuts:

- Ctrl + Mouse Wheel Up/Down
- Ctrl + '+' / '-'
- Ctrl + Arrow Up/Down
- Ctrl + Arrow Right/Left
